message.content:
cs.CR, cs.AR, cs.SE, cs.PL, cs.SY

The paper discusses a novel idea for achieving byte-granular memory safety with low overheads, which is a topic related to computer security (cs.CR) and computer architecture (cs.AR). The paper also mentions the integration of metadata into microarchitecture, which falls under the category of system design and implementation (cs.SE). Additionally, the paper proposes a new system called Califorms, which involves changes to the cache line format, indicating a focus on programming languages and compilers (cs.PL) and system-level design (cs.SY).
